text:
AI is moving and moving fast. The models are 
larger, the computational demands are increasing,

and scale is a fact of life. As developers 
and enterprises race to catch up with

Generative AI today, the infrastructure 
challenges of tomorrow loom larger,

and it is precisely these challenges 
that Anyscale was built to take on.
Anyscale offers

three core products that reflect the different 
phases of LLM and Generative AI adoption,
Anyscale Endpoints, and the Anyscale Platform.

At the outset, what matters is rapid 
iteration and validating your product.

Anyscale Endpoints is an API 
that offers the most popular open

models that integrate directly into your 
features and applications from day one.

With the fine tuning API, you can customize 
smaller models on domain specific tasks,

allowing you to further cut costs. 
If you need more security, control,

or customizability, you can 
use Anyscale Private Endpoints.

With this, you're able to enjoy the 
same experience as Anyscale Endpoints,

but you can deploy these same 
optimizations privately in your

cloud account and seamlessly integrate with your 
existing enterprise controls and governance.
As your Generative AI adoption matures,

What matters is scale and 
everything that comes with it.

Reducing cost, reducing 
latency, improving quality,
expanding the application, and retaining control.
The Anyscale platform is a comprehensive,

managed compute platform built on Ray that makes 
it easy to scale machine learning workloads. For

a complex set of requirements, we 
offer multiple targeted solutions.

Our managed control plane takes the stress 
out of overseeing your Ray clusters,

whether they're in your cloud or 
anywhere Kubernetes operates. You

focus on the big picture and your core 
value, and we handle the intricacies.
With smart infrastructure management,

you get to choose the best instances across 
cloud providers, regions, availability zones,

and between spot and on demand instance 
types to balance out cost and availability.

Enjoy better performance and reliability 
with improved cluster optimization,

faster cluster startup times, and failover. 
You can utilize Anyscale's Jobs and Services

CLIs and API for handling both batch and real 
time workloads for easy production transition.
And dependency management is everyone's headache.

Whether you prefer our Docker images or you have 
your own, integration is easy on Anyscale. With

our robust access controls, You can implement 
fine grained access and let teams create AI

apps on a robust, self service, and secure 
platform. And finally, you can feel secure

knowing that Anyscale is SOC2 Type 2 compliant 
and your data never exits your cloud account.

Let's take a deeper dive into 
three pillar features of the
Anyscale platform. Workspaces, Jobs, and Services.

Anyscale Workspaces is a fully managed 
development environment that enables an

easy transition from development 
to production. For developers,

you have familiar tooling like VSCode and 
Jupyter giving you a laptop like experience,

but it allows you to harness the power 
of a cluster running in the cloud.

When it comes time to scale your experiments, 
you can preserve the identical environment and

compute configuration without rewriting 
code. Anyscale Jobs launch on a dedicated

cluster with the ability to launch hundreds of 
jobs, each taking less than a minute to start,

all with automatic retries using 
both spot and on demand instances.

Once the job is complete, resources are 
reallocated and alerts are sent to you

with links to persistent logs. Anyscale 
Services enables you to deploy everything

from simple to intricate real time pipelines 
on heterogeneous compute efficiently using

Python. You can benefit from resource allocation, 
autoscaling, and high availability load balancer,

with no downtime upgrades for powering 
even the most demanding AI applications.

The challenges in AI are real, but with Anyscale, 
the solutions become tangible. Whether your

priority today is rapid iteration with Anyscale 
Endpoints, or scaling machine learning and

production with the Anyscale platform, let us meet 
you where you are. Come build a future where the

obstacles become stepping stones and AI is not a 
dream to catch up with, but a reality you shape.
Welcome to Anyscale.
